## Simulate count data 

```{r}

# simulation

simData <- function(n = 40,
                    alpha = 3.5576,
                    beta1 = -0.0912,
                    beta2 = 0.0091,
                    beta3 = -0.00014){


  data <- tibble(year = 1:n,
                 yr = (year - mean(year)) / sd(year),
                 yr2 = yr^2,
                 yr3 = yr^3) %>%
    mutate(alpha = alpha,
           beta1 = beta1,
           beta2 = beta2,
           beta3 = beta3,
           log_expected_count = alpha + beta1 * year + beta2 * year^2 + beta3 * year^3,
           expected_count = exp(log_expected_count),
           C = rpois(n = n, lambda = expected_count))


  return(data)

}


data <- simData()

```

## Plot simulated counts

```{r}

ggplot(data, aes(year, C)) +
  geom_path()

```

## Model simulated counts using brm

```{r}

m_brm <- brm(C ~ 1 + yr + yr2 + yr3,
             data = data,
             family = poisson(link = "log"))


m_brm


```

```{r}

stancode(m_brm$fit)

```


```{r}

preds <- data %>%
  add_epred_draws(m_brm)


ggplot(preds, aes(year, .epred)) +
  stat_lineribbon(alpha = 0.25, fill = "red") +
  geom_line(aes(year, C))

```


```{r}

m_ret <- ulam(
  
  alist(C ~ dpois(lambda),
        log(lambda) <- a + b1 * yr + b2 * yr2 + b3 * yr3,
        a ~ dnorm(0, 5),
        b1 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b2 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b3 ~ dnorm(0, 2)),
  data = data, 
  chains = 2,
  iter = 1000
  
)

m_ret
precis(m_ret)
traceplot(m_ret)

```

```{r}

data_real <- read_rdump("GLM_Poisson.data.R")

data <- tibble(yr = data_real$year,
               yr2 = yr^2,
               yr3 = yr^3,
               C = data_real$C)

m_per <- ulam(
  
  alist(C ~ dpois(lambda),
        log(lambda) <- a + b1 * yr + b2 * yr2 + b3 * yr3,
        a ~ dnorm(0, 5),
        b1 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b2 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b3 ~ dnorm(0, 2)),
  data = data, 
  chains = 2,
  iter = 1000
  
)

m_per
precis(m_per)
traceplot(m_per)

post <- extract.samples(m_per, n = 1000)

pr <- link(m_per) 


```

## Model nestlings

```{r}

data_real <- read_rdump("GLM_Binomial.data.R")

data <- tibble(yr = data_real$year,
               yr2 = yr^2,
               yr3 = yr^3,
               C = data_real$C)

m_eye <- ulam(
  
  alist(C ~ dpois(lambda),
        log(lambda) <- a + b1 * yr + b2 * yr2 + b3 * yr3,
        a ~ dnorm(0, 5),
        b1 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b2 ~ dnorm(0, 2),
        b3 ~ dnorm(0, 2)),
  data = data, 
  chains = 2,
  iter = 1000
  
)

m_eye
precis(m_eye)
traceplot(m_eye)

pr <- link(m_per) %>%
  data.frame() %>%
  pivot_longer(1:40) %>%
  mutate(name = as.integer(str_remove(name, "X")))


ggplot(pr, aes(name, value)) +
  stat_lineribbon(alpha = 0.25, fill = "red")


```
